GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object corresponding to the given article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a comments object corresponding to the given article_id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to given article and serves comment object corresponding to the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increases or decreases the number of votes on a given article and serves the article

article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
